metadata.name: Bones That Whisper
metadata.description:
"Bones That Whisper"  
 20 x 24 inches Digital Photograph

The “Dissolve” series superimposes photos I took while confronting chronic illness with self portraits made in the ocean, three years after life saving surgery. 

The sea has always been a great equalizer, cleanser, and healer. It dissolves life’s troubles, erases physical deformity, and brings me into a present state of wholeness. These images are deep with personal history, meaning, and a hope that beauty can be found in the the pain of the past.

“I have one small drop of knowing in my soul. Let it dissolve in your ocean.”  - RUMI


The holder of this NFT may display the associated JPEG privately. The license includes limited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Creator retains full copyright.
